title: Permanently Banned
body: I was permanently banned 5-6 months ago and it really took a toll on me, after spending between $2000-$3000 on the game i was left speechless, i am looking to create a ticket to possibly appeal my ban but i cannot find anywhere to do so, after talking about this with my psychologist, I have realised the bigotry language i was using and the true effect my words can have on others, i hope some people can back me in this struggle as i truly would like to use my account again, and would like to use the skins i worked hard to pay for

replies.body: I can back you if you truly understand wording can effect others for hours if not days.
Riot will slap you in the face with their scrotum buddy. They don't unban accounts, period. They should really start though.
